name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: In a bowl, mix lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken breasts in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Serve with your favorite side dishes.

name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa in vegetable broth according to package instructions.
Let quinoa cool, then fluff with a fork.
In a bowl, combine quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette dressing and toss gently.
Serve chilled.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes.
Cook until garlic is golden, then remove from heat.
Toss cooked spaghetti in the garlic-infused oil.
Garnish with fresh parsley and Parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Coconut Curry Chickpeas
instructions: Sauté chopped onion until translucent.
Add diced tomatoes, curry powder, turmeric, salt, and pepper.
Stir in chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

name: Honey Mustard Glazed Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix Dijon mustard, honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Brush the mixture over salmon fillets.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until salmon flakes easily.
Serve with steamed vegetables or rice.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté chopped onion in butter until softened.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until browned.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in white wine and cook until mostly evaporated.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring until rice is creamy.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve hot.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat.
Add sliced chicken and stir-fry until cooked.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot; stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Mix in soy sauce and hoisin sauce.
Serve over rice or noodles.

name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a blender, combine basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, and olive oil. Blend into a pesto sauce.
Toss cooked pasta with pesto sauce and cherry tomatoes.
Serve with additional Parmesan if desired.

name: Black Bean and Corn Salad
instructions: In a bowl, combine black beans, corn, bell pepper, red onion, and cilantro.
Mix in lime juice, salt, and cumin.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Enjoy as a refreshing salad or as a side dish.
